unittitle_ssm: Viscount and Viscountess Halifax photographs of Jewish Hospital of Brooklyn
abstract_ssm: The collection contains black-and-white publicity-style photographs of Viscount and Viscountess Halifax during two visits to the Jewish Hospital of Brooklyn in 1943.
